website_summaries.verdict: The overall reaction towards the Charged Escape 3 has been positive. People are mostly happy with what this Under Armour running shoe has to offer. The highlights include the upper’s accommodating construction, the midsole’s reactive and cloud-like experience, and the versatile configuration of the aesthetics. On the other hand, the warm in-shoe hug and the required break-in period became areas of criticism.Fans of neutral running shoes ideal for the roads are the ones who are likely to enjoy the Under Armour Charged Escape 3.
pros: The upper of the Under Armour Charged Escape 3 is praised for being secure and form-fitting
Several testers report that the midfoot area of the platform is able to provide support for the arch
A handful of purchasers believe that the midsole unit offers a ride that is similar to walking on clouds
The durability of the materials is confirmed by some users who have worn this running shoe for extended periods
Some people say that the weight of this product is relatively light and suitable for all-day use
The aesthetics of this product are welcomed by casual shoe enthusiasts and those with active lifestyles
cons: A few consumers claim that the in-shoe experience is a bit stifling
Some testers report that the Under Armour Charged Escape 3 needed a break-in period to be fully comfortable
A number of purchasers were disappointed with the pricing of the shoe

customer_reviews.title: A great training shoe for the gym
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant shoe. Bought purely for the gym as my last pair (Nike) were too soft and light, often coming off on the rower due to the soft back! This shoe is solid enough when weight training and cross training, especially with the plastic heel at the back. This is a second pair which I’m keeping in storage until my current pair wear out, as I don’t want to be searching around again in 12-18 months time.
customer_reviews.author: G B.

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: First time I’ve bought UA running trainers and I found them a little on the large side. Other than that they are a comfy trainer which has eliminated much of the feel of the woodland surface I run through.
customer_reviews.author: P. Connell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but a bit too warm for summer days.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing pair of runners. Very good value. Comfortable but a bit too warm when the temp goes above 20. But still they are the best pair of runners I ever owned. Size UK 9 is the real size 9. I'd say they will be perfect for spring/fall or a bit cooler summer days.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: love these trainers, they fit great and are so comfortable for walking and jogging, great price and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Keano

customer_reviews.title: Buy these ASAP!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as shoes for work, provide very good comfort, no blisters from the heel, very good insole cushioning, they are light and comfortable, flexible if you have broader feet.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT THOMSON

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, supportive and durable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and appear to be durable, I have 3 marathons this year so they'll certainly be put to the test!
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Black Gold Style and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for the gym and combo of black and gold is a serve for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy shoes not just for running but for gym too. Meet an expectations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for wider feet
customer_reviews.text: I am size 12 and have wider feet so struggle sometimes with foot ware. I find these trainers really comfortable to run in and they look smart too. I’m not normal a fan of black trainers but these look good. Would definitely recommend and I am thinking of buying a second pair myself. Pros: - good for wider feet - look smart - good grip - dry quicker than other trainers I own Cons: - I found the grip very slippy (Especially in the wet) the first day or so of wearing them but they eventually wore in and provided excellent grip even in the wet.
customer_reviews.author: JonnyW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoes for Running Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I wanted some new running shoes. my old ones were already completely gone, but also from UA and with these I was very satisfied. Therefore, the thought for a new purchase just another model. I really have to say that the shoes fit as expected and feel great while running. Both sprints and distance runs are no problem. Clearly a purchase recommendation! I will order my next running shoes again at UA.
customer_reviews.author: Tobias Schalyo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent runners/trainers. 5*
customer_reviews.text: I started back running a few months ago and was having issues with the soles of my feet, normally an Asics person I tried these due to previous reviews and the price discount, I was not disappointed. Light weight, great cushion in the sole, great support overall and feet are fine after each 10k run now. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PN087

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early opened the box firstly I thought they were sprayed with something there were dots over the side and back iam wiping them with a damp cloth to clean them it's not coming off then I realized it's supposed to be like that. Tell you what there really comfortable but a bit loose at the heal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars fi
customer_reviews.text: a brilliant pair of trainers from the word go fit so snug ive tried other trainers but under armour as ive bought on here before just had to buy again for pure comfort and so nicely priced on Amazon but these have been the best fit for me and I have bad injuries
customer_reviews.author: Yid1

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable trainer
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable trainers that I have worn. They are light weight and look good. I use them for walking and they give the impression that you are walking on air. These are so good that I purchased a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Best trainers I’ve bought! Great for running, yet to get them in the gym though! Damn you Covid!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tezza

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fit snug.
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoes but unfortunately i didn’t like them on so returned but they were 100% every other way! I normally wear a 8 in Adidas and Nike but im a 7.5 in these so i would say smaller fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to trying these on as I’ve bought everything else from the under armour range & have always been very happy. But I won’t buy a pair of under armour trainers again. Not comfortable, too heavy & chunky just not at all what I expected from under armour
customer_reviews.author: Garry B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gym shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the gym. I love them, so comfy and amazing value for money. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sansom

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wear them for work as I’m on my feet 9hrs a day sometimes and they’re so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Phill Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, comfy and sturdy - better than expected and definitely worth the price. Like walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and the most comfortable trainers I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine but it has wore down very quickly, needs the sole to be a bit more robust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really like the quality and the design of the shoe. It fits perfectly, is comfortable, and the price performance ratio is on point!
customer_reviews.author: Tjark

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these trainers for my son and he was delighted with them....enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Cool Training Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The trainers are a good fit lightweight, very comfortable and look good. Seem like a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MR J DICKINSON

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality and odd sizing
customer_reviews.text: Size 9 is huge compared to any other size 9 I've ever had, and the overall quality is appalling. They're like £10 trainers
customer_reviews.author: Sye

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. Comfy to wear. Nice support to run in.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bonar

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great fit and look good too
customer_reviews.text: Just received these in a bundle using Prime Wardrobe. Great idea, as I could order up to 6 pairs and try before I buy. These fit perfectly. I'm usually UK 7.5 to 8. 7.5 fit spot on. I really like the heel, as it is shaped to grib the heel, so doesn't move up and down with every step. I'm yet to use them in anger, but will report back once I have had a few short runs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dominic Raywood

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Charged Escape 3 Trainers for Sports, Jogging Shoes
product_meta.description:
Under Armour UA Charged Escape three Sports Shoes - Stay lighter than air during exercise with these essential men's running shoes.

These shoes are designed for runners who need a balance of flexibility and cushioning. A lightweight upper hugs the foot for breathable, flexible support, while a firm external heel counter gives additional support and keeps the back of the foot locked in place. On the inside, a moulded Comfort Collar locks in the heel with a soft, plush feel for zero distractions. A Comfort sockliner takes the shape of your foot, with added padding in the heel for cushioning at the heel-strike. The Dual-layer Charged Cushioning midsole is firmer below the heel and softer below the forefoot for a blend of support and comfort that's built to perform. In addition, a rubber outsole provides full ground contact with deep flex grooves for extra flexibility where you need it most. High-abrasion rubber has been added to heavy-wear areas of the sole to increase durability, and the shoe features reflective details for greater visibility on low-light runs. The runners are made of mesh.

UNDER ARMOUR MAKES ATHLETES BETTER.

We started with a T-shirt that gave athletes an undeniable advantage and ultimately resulted in a complete renewal of sportswear. Today, innovation is our lifeblood and the key to achieving our brand mission.

The product details:

 * Men's running shoes
 * Dual-layer Charged Cushioning midsole
 * Firm external heel and moulded Comfort Collar 
 * Fast-drying fabric
 * Comfortable and breathable
 * Material: Mesh
 * Fit: Men's
feature_bullets: Full Support - These athletic shoes have a firm external heel counter and a moulded Comfort Collar to keep the back of the foot locked in place
Extra Comfort - The gym runners have a comfort sockliner that takes the shape of the foot, with added padding in the heel for heel-strike cushioning
Material Composition: UPPER: 65% Textile,35% Synthetic~OUTSOLE: 96% Rubber,4% Ethy
Smart Sole - These running shoes' dual-layer charged cushioning midsole is firmer below the heel and softer below the forefoot for support and comfort
Essential Gear - These gym shoes are for runners who need a balance of flexibility and cushioning, Lightweight uppers hug the foot for flexible support
Material and Fit - Under Armour UA Charged Escape 3 sports shoes for men, Men's trainers for running etc, Material: Mesh, Fit: Men's - varying sizes
